answers_C: Peaceful co-existence means different people living together without disagreement or fight, in harmony and peace.
Jesus advised us to forgive the person and live happily together.
Esau and Jacob, Abraham and Lot (or Philemon and Onesimus, Isaac and Abimelech).
Jonathan loved David as his own soul. He saved David from King Saul's plans by warning him and hiding him. They also made a covenant.
Pupils can show love by sharing their belongings with others and protecting one another when there is danger.
